content: Why is this not broadcasted more prominently?
I'm confused, twice a year or every two years? Because there is one in spring so it can't be twice a year because we had one this year
@nagisa Where did you hear this? I'm part of the team organising the all hands and we didn't send that out? Are you maybe confusing the registration date on the email with the event date?
The all hands is scheduled for March 16th–20th 2020. There are no other all hands events being planned.
Mozilla themselves also have "all hands", so maybe this is where the confusion is coming from ?
Would be interested in the source of this :laughing:
The Rust Intern job posting ctrl+f for bi-annual I guess it could be mozilla’s all hands, yea
Yep, that's the Mozilla All Hands. https://wiki.mozilla.org/All_Hands
